# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

from collections import Counter

n = int(input())
s = input()

c = Counter(s)

ans = n - sum(c.values())

print(ans)


from collections import Counter

n = int(input())
s = input()
counter = 0

for i in Counter(s).values():
    counter += i - 1

print(counter)

from collections import Counter

n = int(input())
s = input()
c = Counter(s)
ans = n - sum(c.values())
print(ans)

from collections import Counter

n = int(input())
s = input()

counter = 0

for i in Counter(s).values():
    counter += i // 2

print(counter)
